response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a symbol of innovation and quality that we're confident will exceed your expectations. Given its unique features and the time and resources invested in its development, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you for $15,000. We understand that value is subjective and varies from person to person, so if this price aligns with what you see in the product, we would be delighted to proceed with the sale. Should you have any questions or need further details about the product, please let us know. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 15000}
